CustomField.formula: IF( CPQ_Margin_Percent__c >= $Setup.CPQ_Settings__c.CPQ_LT1__c , IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green"), IF ( CPQ_Margin_Percent__c >= $Setup.CPQ_Settings__c.CPQ_LT2__c , IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Yellow"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red")))
CustomField.label: **Line Score
